title.narrative: Tier 1 and Tier 1 Phase 2, Strengthening of trade-related capacities for the implementation of the Enhanced Integrated Framework (EIF) in DRC

description.narrative: The Government is planning on a ministerial restructuring, which would incorporate the NIU and the seconded staff into the Ministry. The Government is also planning on contributions (detailed above) as well as developing a resource mobilization strategy with development partners for ongoing activities and new projects. To ensure sustainability, the Government of DRC is providing important counterpart funding for expertise in the development of the medium-term plan and the national trade strategy. The NIU will support these activities, particularly with monitoring and evaluation (M&E), and will eventually become part of the Ministry as a Cellule Cadre Intégré Renforcé, taking on the additional task of coordination of Aid for Trade activities.

participating-org.narrative: EIF National Implementation Unit, Ministry of Economy and Commerce

provider-org.narrative: UNOPS helps the UN and its partners run peacebuilding, humanitarian and development operations for people in need.

transaction.ref: Adjustment transfer of balance of pre-DTIS
